dublin_core.dcvalue: Heartfile Financing is an mHealth-enabled fund-based purchasing system which aligns service providers, patients, and donors in order to provide financial assistance to patients with non-communicable diseases.
Facility-based provider, Facility-based patient, Facility, Public sector health system (national, regional,, CHW
Dr. Sania Nishtar, Founder, Heartfile, Email: sania@heartfile.org, Tel: +92-51-8358968

Electronic decision support, Financial transactions and incentives, Supply chain management, Child health, Maternal health, Non-communicable diseases
